api_key_auth.description: API key authentication. Use "Bearer YOUR_API_KEY" format.

post.description: Validates a QR code data. Scan the QR code and pass the data and optionally manages metadata entries

400.description: Bad request - Invalid QR code format

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid API key

403.description: Forbidden - Insufficient permissions or validation error

404.description: Not found - Ticket not found or not accessible

422.description: Unprocessable entity - Ticket status is $STATUS, expected PAID

429.description: Rate Limit Exceeded - Please try again later.

get.description: Returns a paginated list of your event bookings. The bookings are sorted in order, with the most recent bookings appearing first.

amount.description: The total amount intended to be collected.

amountPaid.description: The amount of money paid toward the total.

amountDue.description: The outstanding amount of money to be paid.

canceledBy.description: The userId that canceled this. If this is a booking, tickets were canceled in addition.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid API key

403.description: Forbidden - Insufficient permissions or validation error

429.description: Rate Limit Exceeded - Please try again later.

get.description: Returns comprehensive health information about the current API key including usage statistics, rate limits, expiration status, and health recommendations

200.description: API key health information retrieved successfully

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid API key

403.description: Forbidden - Insufficient permissions or validation error

429.description: Rate Limit Exceeded - Please try again later.

get.description: Returns a paginated list of your customers. The customers are sorted in order, with the most recent customers appearing first.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid API key

403.description: Forbidden - Insufficient permissions or validation error

429.description: Rate Limit Exceeded - Please try again later.

get.description: Returns detailed information for a specific customer.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid API key

403.description: Forbidden - Insufficient permissions or validation error

404.description: Customer not found or not accessible

429.description: Rate Limit Exceeded - Please try again later.

post.description: Creates a coupon. A coupon has either an amountOff and currency or percentOff. The coupon created will be automatically synchronized with Stripe if you have a connected stripe account. If you are not connected the endpoint will throw an error.

code.description: The coupon code a customer enters.

amountOff.description: A positive integer representing the amount to subtract from an invoice total (required if `percent_off` is not passed).

currency.description: Three-letter ISO code for the currency of the amountOff parameter (required if `amountOff` is passed).

durationInMonths.description: A positive integer representing the number of months the coupon applies for (required if `duration === repeating`)

percentOff.description: A positive float larger than 0, and smaller or equal to 100, that represents the discount the coupon will apply (required if `amount_off` is not passed).

pageIds.description: A list of pageIds that this coupon can be used within.

maxRedemptions.description: The total amount of times this coupon can be used. Doesn't limit a single customer from redeeming multiple times.

redeemBy.description: The ISO datetime that this coupon must be used before.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid API key

403.description: Forbidden - Insufficient permissions or validation error

429.description: Rate Limit Exceeded - Please try again later.

get.description: Returns a paginated list of your coupons. The coupons are sorted in order, with the most recent coupons appearing first.
